body: Can someone tell me how to join a team and be in a tournament?
body_tagged: Can someone tell me how to join a team and be in a tournament?
title: Teams

replies.body:
First of all, find a position that you find fun and that you're good at, so defence, rusher, midfield, etc.

Second, get a good PvP K/D, play on servers like Badlion to improve your PvP skills.

Third, make a post in the Looking for Team section, and say basic things like your preferred position, any past teams, can you talk in TeamSpeak, your PvP K/D, your Skype.
replies.body_tagged:
First of all, find a position that you find fun and that you're good at, so defence, rusher, midfield, etc.

Second, get a good PvP K/D, play on servers like Badlion to improve your PvP skills.

Third, make a post in the Looking for Team section, and say basic things like your preferred position, any past teams, can you talk in TeamSpeak, your PvP K/D, your Skype.

replies.body: All of this is good, except for the PvP K/D part. No decent team judges you based off of that anymore.
replies.body_tagged: All of this is good, except for the PvP K/D part. No decent team judges you based off of that anymore.

replies.body: A lot of people tend to just mess around during public games. But I can see where you're coming from. A bad KD can make you look bad I suppose.

replies.body: People who camp or play defense have higher kds, doesn't necessarily mean that they are better at pvp.
